name: V-Rally 3
synopsis: V-Rally evolves in its third installment with more detailed cars, customizable rally cars, and scurrying spectators. The world's top rally cars--including Subaru Impreza, Mitsubishi Lancer Evolution 7, Citroen Xsara, and Ford Focus--are included in V-Rally 3. Choose one, and then overcome spectators, deformed car parts, and extreme driving conditions as you race in six real-world locations and various gameplay modes. The life of a professional rally driver is rough--it's up to you to strategize your career and race your way to the top.
